channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Live: The Hundred
channel.desc: England captain Nat Sciver Brunt's Trent Rockets host Sophie Ecclestone's Manchester Originals at Trent Bridge. 2024's match between these two teams finished in a last-ball thriller, with the Originals winning by one run despite a brilliant 56 not out from Sciver-Brunt. Alex Hartley and Rick Edwards present, alongside Sir Alastair Cook, Steven Finn, Tash Farrant and Carlos Brathwaite.
